item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: install.packages("opendatatoronto") ## Installing package into '/home/rstudio-user/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/4.0' ## (as 'lib' is unspecified) install.packages("plyr") ## Installing package into '/home/rstudio-user/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/4.0' ## (as 'lib' is unspecified) library(opendatatoronto) library(plyr) package <- show_package("86a256ce-cf39-4e78-b43a-4f24aafe9747") package <- package %>% list_package_resources() my_data <- package %>% get_resource() my_data <- my_data[1] my_data ## $Sheet1 ## # A tibble: 2,238 x 22 ## Timestamp `1.
